publishedfiledetails.title: Awesome SpyGlass!
publishedfiledetails.description:
1404697612

Like a regular SpyGlass, except Awesomer!

- Shows name, level, gender, age, if max level and team
- If tamed shows the level it was tamed at
- Completely hands free (can be used with a weapon)
- Shows the dinos more relevant stats and level points (wild and tamed)
- Tells you if a dino can be tamed, how and what with
- Shows buffs on the target and time remaining
- Ignores the dino you are riding
- Same crafting cost etc as vanilla SpyGlass
- Zoom with RMB, or RMB+Shift while riding or using a weapon
- A whole bunch of customization options in the settings (ALT+S) (See pics)

- Works on Players

- Works on Supply Crates
- Shows crates required level, health(time remaining) and contents

- Several options can be enabled/disabled globally via admin settings in game (See pics) or in INI

[code]
EngramEntry_AwesomeSpyglass
PrimalItem_AwesomeSpyGlass
[/code]

[h1]MODDERS[/h1]

You can now add custom info to your dinos and it'll display in the UI!
Just add a custom tag to your dino that starts with [code]:SpyGlass:[/code] All following text will show in the UI.

[h1]INI Options[/h1]

INI options will only take effect if \ARK\ShooterGame\Saved\SaveGames\AwesomeSpyGlassServerSettings.sav does not exist. The save file gets automatically created if one does not exist and uses the INI settings to create it, else uses default of everything enabled. After that you must use in game settings or delete the save file again to reload new INI options. In game settings override INI.

[AwesomeSpyGlass]

Disable GPS
[code]
AllowGPS=1
[/code]

Disable Outline
[code]
AllowOutline=1
[/code]

Disable Player Trageting
[code]
AllowPlayerTargeting=1
[/code]

Disable Crate Trageting
[code]
AllowCrateTargeting=1
[/code]


Enjoy :)
